text: 513x513px The Portrait of a Gonfaloniere is a painting by the Italian baroque artist Artemisia Gentileschi. It hangs in the Palazzio d'Accursio, Bologna. It is a portrait of an unknown gonfaloniere standing in full regalia and was painted in 1622. == References == Category:1620s paintings Category:Paintings by Artemisia Gentileschi Category:Paintings in Bologna Category:Portraits by Italian artists
title: Portrait of a Gonfaloniere
